trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SEQ_00<tab>Hunmu Rruk stands quietly, his expression one of old pain.

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SEQ_01<tab>After divulging the truth of his relation to Wuk Lamat, Hunmu Rruk requests a moment to compose himself. You return to the Garden of the Stars, leaving the Xbr'aax Rax alone with his thoughts.

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SEQ_02<tab>No sooner do you rejoin Wuk Lamat than one of Bakool Ja Ja's minions arrives to escort Wuk Lamat to an undisclosed location for purposes unknown. Whatever it is, it cannot be good, so Wuk Lamat answers this summons with you as her second. Thus are you led to the Xobr'it Cinderfield, where you discover that a swaggering Bakool Ja Ja holds hostage Hunmu Rruk─whom he exposes as Wuk Lamat's birth father. The elector's release is contingent upon Wuk Lamat placing her keystones on the line and triumphing over Bakool Ja Ja in single combat. All you can do is trust in your friend as she attempts to settle the score with her tormentor once and for all...

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SEQ_03<tab>Bakool Ja Ja brings to bear the full wrath of blessed siblings, but to little effect. Unable to tolerate the impending defeat of their fearless leader, lackeys and bandits who have tied their fate to the two-headed claimant join the fray─yet Wuk Lamat stands firm. Out of options and out of strength, Bakool Ja Ja flees into the forest, abandoning his prisoner.
Before Wuk Lamat can confirm the truth of her heritage, Hunmu Rruk diverts the conversation, praising her strength as Gulool Ja Ja's daughter. His eyes bespeak a kindness and resolution to leave other words unsaid, which Wuk Lamat no doubt sees as well. Though you cannot know her heart, her smile says enough.

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SEQ_04<tab>Wuk Lamat has proven to both herself and the world that even when forced to stand alone, she is capable of protecting what is precious to her. Whatever the final feat demands, it is clear that she can rise to the occasion.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HUNMURRUK_000_001<tab>Recalling the past has rendered me...emotional.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HUNMURRUK_000_002<tab>I require a moment to compose myself. But please, do not keep the Third Promise waiting.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HUNMURRUK_000_005<tab>I feel better having spoken with you. My thanks.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_KRILE_000_010<tab>Finished speaking with Hunmu Rruk, have you?

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Upon speaking with Wuk Lamat, several cutscenes will play in sequence. It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_016<tab>You're back! So what did Hunmu Rruk want?

TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_017<tab>Heh, it's all right, you don't have to say. More importantly, the Ty'iinbek Traverse <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> isn't clear yet. Something about even more rocks.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_KRILE_000_018<tab>Then I think I'll take the opportunity to rest. All that cooking and preparing for it has worn me out...
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_019<tab>A nap <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> sound tempting...
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HOOBIGOBAKOOLJAJAMINIONSA_000_020<tab>(-???-)A moment, Promise.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>You're one of Bakool Ja Ja's... What do you want?
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HOOBIGOBAKOOLJAJAMINIONSA_000_022<tab>I've come to fetch you. You're welcome to refuse, but know that it would be most unwise.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>And why's that?
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HOOBIGOBAKOOLJAJAMINIONSA_000_024<tab>I'm sure your salted friend has an idea. What do <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> think?
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_HOOBIGOBAKOOLJAJAMINIONSA_000_025<tab>And they say house cats don't come when called! Follow me, Promise.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>In this battle, you will play as Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>Through skillful combat, Wuk Lamat will gain the resolve she needs to unleash powerful limit breaks.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Not only do these attacks deal great damage, they will recover HP. Use them early and often to emerge victorious!
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You must be a Disciple of War or Magic of level 94 or above to proceed.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_KRILE_000_040<tab>For as weathered as our Promise looks, she's positively glowing with confidence. What in the world happened?
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_ERENVILLE_000_045<tab>The twins ran me from one end of the Ut'ohmu Horizon to the other, asking about everything of remote interest along the way...
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Erenville's tour was both educational and exciting! I hope we can persuade him to conduct another in the lower forests.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_ALISAIE_000_055<tab>Did something happen while we were away? There's a certain satisfied air about you...
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_060<tab>Seems we were last to return. I'm glad everyone made it back safely.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>Thank you for having faith in me. Keeping out of the fight even when it got dirty couldn't have been easy for you.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>But Bakool Ja Ja won't be the last person to threaten those I care about.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_063<tab>I wanted to prove to myself that I can stand up to such villains, even when I stand alone.
TEXT_KINGMC106_04902_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>Which isn't to say I won't ask for your help when I need it, of course! I know better than that now!
